mapper.select: select * from paper where title = #{title} and authors = #{authors}
mapper.insert: insert into paper(title, authors, affiliations, publicTitle, year, startPage, endPage, paperAbstract, pdfLink, authorKeyWord, referenceCount, publisher, docID) values (#{title},#{authors},#{affiliations},#{publicTitle}, #{year},#{sp},#{ep},#{abs},#{pdf}, #{keyWord},#{ref},#{pub},#{docId})
